content: The First Prince of Flowing Sands is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss just past the Sandgate Village in a large valley cave, and will need to defeat him to unlock more than one secret boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'First_Prince_of_Flowing_Sands.md', within the main section titled 'First Prince of Flowing Sands'.
The content is as follows:
The First Prince of Flowing Sands is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss just past the Sandgate Village in a large valley cave, and will need to defeat him to unlock more than one secret boss.
